about.name: Tzuhan Hsu
about.tagline: Trilingual Technical Professional with 10+ years in support and development

jobs.title: Customer Success Manager (Technical Support focus)
description: Primary focus: L2/L3 technical support for 30+ enterprise customers across APAC/EMEA/Oceania as sole APAC support
Troubleshoot complex CI/CD issues: mobile builds, API integrations, Xcode/Gradle/Fastlane, and code signing problems

Analyze customer CI/CD workflows, provide optimization recommendations, and guide adoption of advanced features including pipelines, remote build cache, and release management, resulting in 30-60% build time improvements and increased engineer satisfaction

Proactively monitor customer system usage, identify performance anomalies (build time spikes, success rate drops), and guide customers to implement streamlined monitoring systems using Bitrise Insights for automated alerting

Conduct monthly sync meetings with enterprise customers to address ongoing issues and provide technical guidance, supporting 10+ major Japanese enterprises (7&i Holdings, Recruit, PayPay, DeNA) in native language

jobs.title: Sr. Technical Specialist
description: Achieved 98.8% resolution rate for L2 technical issues without L3 escalation across iOS/Android
Provided technical onboarding for 10+ Japanese enterprise customers, contributing to 10% revenue growth through successful platform adoption
Developed internal knowledge base and troubleshooting runbooks

jobs.title: Sr. Technical Support Engineer
description: Assist worldwide partner companies to integrate Appier's multi-platform SDK into their product and troubleshoot technical issues.
Provide solutions to boost conversion rate and create better user experience with Appier SDK based on my domain knowledge of mobile(android, iOS) and web development and UIUX design.
Share knowledge of app development across the team and continuously develop and enhance personal and team capabilities.

jobs.title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Developed and maintained a stock trading app service of our parent company, OneTapBUY Co., Ltd., with a total of 130k users and an average 40k DAU.

Led an offshore team of 6 developers/QAs in Chengdu, China to delivered 2 new apps and new functionalities of the broker platform, resulting in a 96% increase in user registration and a 40% increase in profit within 10 months.
By analyzing the company's profit model which heavily relys on stock trading transaction fee (about 72%), introduced and implemented a monthly subscription business model.
Refined UI/UX and resolved 10 most occurred bugs of our Android apps, increasing the bug free rate from 97% to 99.2% and reduced 10% of the customer inquiries.
Designed website UI prototypes, translated documents and instructions between Japanese and Chinese, performed code review and unit tests.

jobs.title: Game Programmer
description: Developed and maintained a 7-year-old mobile web game on Gree platform, with an 100k DAU.
Created new game features in a 30-people team.
Created python automation scripts, saved up to 80% preparation time for monthly regular game events updates.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: CI/CD (Bitrise), Linux, Git, MySQL, Python, PHP, Android Programming, Swift, Objective-C, Javascript, C/C++

interests.title: Interests
content: Apart from being a software developer, I enjoy most of my time drawing digital arts and watching Japanese mangas and animations. I'm fond of the fascinating visual impact the artists can create with just one simple pencil.
Aiming to develop my own indie game in the near future, I'm also spending my spare time in learning game programing and 3d modeling/rendering, etc.

certifications.title: Language Skills & Certifications
items: 情報処理技術者試験 ITEE (Information Technology Engineers Examination) Certificated (2017/11)
